citation_details.title: Deep brain stimulation device-specific artefacts in MEG recordings
citation_details.author: ['BH Bahners', 'R Lofredi', 'T Sander', 'A Schnitzler']
citation_details.abstract: Background: Deep brain stimulation (DBS) has strong beneficial effects for treating movement  disorders. The related cortical mechanisms can be studied with magnetoencephalography
